coreAttributes.name: Round Nuts
coreAttributes.description: A small bag of round nuts. A label on one side shows a greater squirrel-girl stuffing a handful of nuts into her mouth.
coreAttributes.applyEffects:
[##npc.incrementHealth(npc.getAttributeValue(ATTRIBUTE_HEALTH_MAXIMUM)/10)]

[npc.Name] [npc.verb(start)] to feel [npc.her] arcane power increasing...

[#npc.addPotionEffect(ATTRIBUTE_MAJOR_ARCANE, 2)]

useDescriptions.selfUse: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(pull)] at the sides of the bag of Round Nuts to open it. A rich, earthy smell accompanies the sight of the nuts inside, and [npc.she] [npc.verb(find)] [npc.herself] unable to resist the delicious-looking display. [npc.She] quickly [npc.verb(wolf)] down the bag's contents, finding that the nuts are as delicious as they look.
useDescriptions.otherUse: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(pull)] at the sides of the bag of Round Nuts to open it, before presenting it to [npc2.name]. A rich, earthy smell accompanies the sight of the nuts inside, and [npc2.name] [npc2.verb(find)] [npc2.herself] unable to resist the delicious-looking display.
